software.description: Web based FrontAccounting is a simple, but powerful, system for the entire ERP chain and covers:
software.custom_post_install_script:
#!/bin/bash
if ! test -f $CONTFSVolHome/company_data/app/config.php
then
rm -rf /home/app/install/
mkdir -p $CONTFSVolHome/company_data/app/
cp /home/app/config.php $CONTFSVolHome/company_data/app/
cp /home/app/config_db.php $CONTFSVolHome/company_data/app/
cp -rp /home/app/lang $CONTFSVolHome/company_data/app/
ln -s $CONTFSVolHome/company_data/app/lang /home/app/
chmod oug-w $CONTFSVolHome/company_data/app/config.php
chmod oug-w $CONTFSVolHome/company_data/app/config_db.php
rm -f /home/app/config.php /home/app/config_db.php
ln -s  $CONTFSVolHome/company_data/app/config.php /home/app/config.php
ln -s $CONTFSVolHome/company_data/app/config_db.php /home/app/config_db.php 

fi
